attributes.action: promote the ideas of Transhumanism and support modern technology and science for good
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Transhumanism, broadly speaking, is an idealism based around the use of modern science and technology to enhance the human body, both mentally and physically.

This would lead to a better functioning class of people creating a better future for the global community, with humans becoming more efficient with their environment.

We ask the Prime Minister to recognise, embrace and promote these ideas by:

- supporting modern technological and scientific advances, even where some may morally object

- opposing Luddites and conflicting religious morality that opposes advancement and progression

so that we may all benefit and reduce the destruction we are causing to this planet.
